alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lewis and northeastern Oswego Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pulaski, or 11 miles southeast of Sandy Island Beach State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pulaski, Central Square, Redfield, Hastings, Richland, Williamstown, Orwell, Parish, Altmar, Osceola, Smartville, Amboy Center, Salmon River Reservoir, Kasoag, and North Osceola. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
